title: Drive By Digital
short: Developed this website for my company. It includes WooCommerce stores with Stripe payment terminals and custom CSS.

title: Microstrategies
short: Developed the company website, using Wordpress. It is a clean, simple business website with a number of plugins and custom CSS.

title: Boxing Laboratory
short: A boxing wordpress website built to client's specifications. Includes booking calendar.

title: Instant Messenger - MERN
short: Using the MERN stack, this is a real-time chat app similar to WhatsApp. Send messages to Mongo DB and refreshes the page in real-time.

title: Joe's Movies - REACT
short: Revamped an old website design of mine with REACT JS. This is now a fully responsive SPA, using React-router. It is completely dynamic, pulling the posts and reviews from JSON files. The styling was done with SASS and makes use of CSS Grid and flexbox.

title: Amazon - REACT Clone
short: An Amazon clone built with REACT JS. This project includes a responsive design, animations and uses Hooks for state management. It also implements Firebase for database management/authentication and Stripe for a dummy payment at the checkout.

title: Netflix REACT Clone
short: A Netflix front-end clone built with REACT JS. Used free APIs from The Movie Database, and Movie Trailer.

title: SlipSpark Logo
short:
Gaming logo designed for a mate. 

 Currently used as an Avatar on Twitch Youtube and other gaming platforms, and as an overlay on live streams

title: Woodstock Logo
short: Logo designed for a friend's startup media company. Used for branding on social media, website, business cards, t-shirts.

title: Burger Builder
short: Burger Builder Application made with REACT JS. Includes authentication and databases using Firebase. Redux is primarily used for state management.

title: Alternate Movie Posters
short: Alternate movie posters created in Adobe Illustrator. They are minimalist in style.

title: ODEON Graphics
short: Various graphics and posters made for marketing purposes while working at ODEON cinema Limerick. These were made in Photoshop.

title: Limerick Jazz Festival
short: Developed Wordpress site for Limerick Jazz Festival in 2012 and have managed updates and content every year since. Includes custom CSS and plugins.

title: Red Castle Design
short: Single Page business website made with Wordpress. Created as a freelance company for design work in 2015. Includes custom CSS and plugins.

title: Lightroom edits
short: Just a few select shots I've taken on holidays. Edited with Adobe Lightroom. See more on my Flickr page below.
